output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
transferFrom function allows asset theft due to incorrect computations of allowance.
buy function does not use random numbers, allowing attackers to always buy the same amount of tokens.
sell function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control on 'this'.
setPrices function allows attackers to set arbitrary sell and buy prices, aka the 'tradeTrap' issue.
